Title: Relates to the assessment of certain real property damaged by the severe storm that occurred on October 29-30, 2012 in a special assessing unit that is not a city
Summary: Relates to the assessment of certain real property damaged by the severe storm that occurred on October 29-30, 2012 in a special assessing unit that is not a city.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the assessment of certain real property damaged by the severe storm that occurred on October twenty-ninth and thirtieth, two thousand twelve in a special assessing unit that is not a city
